Query GDC for annotations

Query GDC for annotations

annotation_fields(primary = TRUE)

annotations(..., token = NULL, fields = annotation_fields())

Arguments

primary
logical(1) when TRUE (default) return commonly populated field names. Otherwise, return all field names defined in the API.
token
(optional) character(1) security token allowing access to restricted data. See https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/API/Users_Guide/Getting_Started/#authentication.
fields
character() vector of requested fields. See annotation_fields() for defined fields.
…
(optional) additional parameters influence annotation selection. See parameters.

Examples

annotations <- annotations()
#> GET request uri:
#> https://gdc-api.nci.nih.gov/annotations?format=JSON&pretty=FALSE&fields=status,category,entity_id,classification,updated_datetime,created_datetime,annotation_id,notes,entity_type,submitter_id,case_id,entity_submitter_id,case_submitter_id&size=10&from=1
annotations
#> class: annotations_list
#> annotations: 10
#> names:
#>     02aa12cb-7108-5710-9d55-6b10555b8e39,
#>     aebc7105-ccf9-5d51-9ef0-f47b624fc5a3,
#>     5cf05f41-ce70-58a3-8ecb-6bfaf6264437, ...,
#>     459ab6a6-849e-5da2-ba03-aa64af6591b1,
#>     ae9291b5-7960-5322-903c-5a1cc12b71dd
annotations[1]
#> class: annotations_list
#> annotations: 1
#> names:
#>     02aa12cb-7108-5710-9d55-6b10555b8e39
#> fields:
#>     status(1)
#>     category(1)
#>     entity_id(1)
#>     classification(1)
#>     updated_datetime(1)
#>     created_datetime(1)
#>     notes(1)
#>     entity_type(1)
#>     submitter_id(1)
#>     case_id(1)
#>     entity_submitter_id(1)
#>     case_submitter_id(1)
unlist(annotations[[1]])
#>                                                                                                                          status 
#>                                                                                                                      "Approved" 
#>                                                                                                                        category 
#>                                                                                                           "Neoadjuvant therapy" 
#>                                                                                                                       entity_id 
#>                                                                                          "b85b14d7-3b5a-4800-af12-622ec03b9fe5" 
#>                                                                                                                  classification 
#>                                                                                                                  "Notification" 
#>                                                                                                                updated_datetime 
#>                                                                                              "2016-05-01T15:00:21.638875-05:00" 
#>                                                                                                                created_datetime 
#>                                                                                                     "2014-08-14T14:25:49-04:00" 
#>                                                                                                                           notes 
#> "Interferon was given less than 90 days prior to cancer procurement, which is exclusionary. (per Kristen Leraas/BCR TCGA-2222)" 
#>                                                                                                                     entity_type 
#>                                                                                                                          "case" 
#>                                                                                                                    submitter_id 
#>                                                                                                                         "21869" 
#>                                                                                                                         case_id 
#>                                                                                          "b85b14d7-3b5a-4800-af12-622ec03b9fe5" 
#>                                                                                                             entity_submitter_id 
#>                                                                                                                  "TCGA-ER-A19T" 
#>                                                                                                               case_submitter_id 
#>                                                                                                                  "TCGA-ER-A19T"
